questions.question: Considering the overall packaging, what is the predominant color observed?
What appears to be the primary material used for the product's packaging?
Based on the visible text, what is the name of the product depicted?
What is the shape of the packaging containing the product?
Observing the text, what language(s) are used on the packaging?
Does the packaging suggest any dietary suitability claims, such as for vegetarians?
What specific plant species is indicated on the packaging as the product's source?
Is there any visible indication of a warning or cautionary message on the packaging?
Judging by the visible text, what is the product's form, i.e., is it powder, seeds, etc.?
Does the visible text provide any information about recommended daily intake?
What is the texture implied by the visible text and overall packaging visual cues?
What is the appearance of the text regarding its font style, is it bold or italicized?
What language, other than English, is indicated on the package?
Considering the visible text, what type of atmosphere is the product packaged in?
Observing the text, what word is used to indicate a warning about the product?
